# Przyk≈Çad

```{r}
A = matrix ( c(1,2,3,0,1,4,7,0,2), byrow = TRUE, nrow=3, ncol=3)
A
```

```{r}
QR = qr(A)
Q = qr.Q(QR)
R = qr.R(QR)
Q
R
```

```{r}
Q %*% R
```

```{r}
Q_1 = matrix(c(1,0,0,-1,1,0,-13/14,-8/17,1), nrow=3, ncol=3, byrow=TRUE)
Q_1
```

```{r}
R_1 = Q_1 %*% A
R_1
```

```{r}
eigen(R_1)
```

```{r}
eigen(A)
```

# Teraz zgodnie z Demmel

```{r}
A
Q = matrix(0, 3, 3)
Q
R = matrix(0, 3, 3)
R
```

## Iteracja 1

```{r}
Q[,1] = A[,1]
Q
R[1,1]=t(Q[,1])%*%Q[,1]
R
```

## Iteracja 2

```{r}
R[1,2] = t(Q[,1]) %*% A[,2]
R[1,2]
```

```{r}
Q[,2] = Q[,2] - R[1,2] * Q[,1]
Q[,2]
```
